locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: We waited for over an hour for a shower. The gentleman who asked one of the employees who was refreshing the coffee what was taking so long told him that the gentleman who cleaned the rooms was on lunch. He had already been waiting well …

Worst pilot to take a shower. The mornings and afternoons. they dont clean showers so people trying to shower in the morning and afternoons good luck! Manager doesn’t care when brought to his attention.do your job!

… hour I entered the store. There were 6 people in line for showers..some were upset yet some understood (like myself) not to mention the many individuals that were there purchasing others items…etc! Sheila informed everyone who was getting …

I like this truck stop but when I come in to shower and watch the guy that cleans the showers use a squeegee to remove water and a dirty wash cloth to wipe down the sink a dirty towel to mop the floor no chemicals were used to sanitize the …
Everytime when go for shower there is NO BATHMATH. 2 days ago I complained but Employees don’t give a damn
45 minutes to clean one shower. People walked out of the shower when I came in. Been the first in line since
No water in the whole facility. Cant take a shower or even wash your hands. No idea when it will return.
Must buy at least 100 gallons of diesel just to get a free shower!
The worst thing for a shower is that it takes more than 3 hours to wait.
Few showers

locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Traveling through the West this is a great place to get gas, go to the bathroom, get a snack or a full meal! Many of the truckers who use Loves also can schedule a shower!
The shower was dirty and covered in hair. Was not cleaned and the towels were dirty and smelled. Disgusting.

… Clean bathrooms. Staff was above average considering I mostly fuel at pilot. But this location absolutely out produces 95% of the pilot/flying J's I've visited. Especially in the shower department. …
No hot water in the shower, no hot dogs available on the grill, menu board in Chester's out of order. Employees looked and acted miserable. Speaks volumes about the management here. …

This place is a disaster. Stopped in to get a shower. The app said 7 showers, 3 available. Actually, 3 were shut down to try and make the hot water go around. Which wasn't working since as I was waiting, 2 drivers came out and complained …

Went in the store behind another driver watched him get a shower at 7pm when drivers are getting off work and need to feel human. Come back to the desk three minutes later to find out they are shutting down the showers for some made up …
… That’s why I prefer Pilot, they’re generous and always surpass your expectations. The only thing why I stopped here, bc currently I can’t buy a shower on Pilot’s app. I’m sure they’re gonna fix it.

… were dirty, but that can be expected since I showed up during the night rush. The shower that I tried to take a shower in was a completely different story. The lights were very similar, and the light in the shower was burned out, so I …

Literally spent $850 in diesel to fill up my tanks and get a “free shower” (which is the least truck stops can do for truck drivers). Checked in for the shower and I’m 8th in line at 11 PM because the lazy and useless ppl working Night …

I agree this is the most disgusting Love's truck stop .When you shower your showering with others peoples hairs, filthy. Employees seem like there only here for just a paycheck ..Nasty place first and last time taking a shower here.. With …

showerReviews.reviewText: … gas in the area! But this place is more than just gas but they provide little bit of everything for long distance driver or traveler as they provide shower, laundry, game room, food court and other essentials for trips! Twas a good one for …

… The handicap shower was missing bars and the chair in the shower itself. When I closed the door the fan fell off the wall.  The drain cover was behind the toilet instead of in the shower covering the drain. …
Do not shower here until this is rectified. …

… her  she went above and beyond for me and my stinky little dog today.  All the employees were super nice and efficient  The store was very clean and so was my shower  There was a good variety of food items also  Great Experience Thanks Amy
The worst truck stop I've ever been to. Difficult parking, a two-hour wait to shower, no hot water in the showers, and no toilet paper in the public restrooms. Expensive diesel.
Why in every single truck stop I have to spend 2 hours of waiting for shower ? Losing 2 hours of my log book hours is a big deal!!! …

I am an over the road truck driver I always come to flying J To take my showers it’s been my experience that they are always the cleanest showers until today. There is only one towel no washcloths to scrub with in the shower and no bath mat …
Waiting time for shower is 2 hrs…no body to clean there…they don’t care about the drivers..shame on them…

The only problem with this truck station is that they never have clean showers available. There can be 3 or 4 people waiting in line for hours.... every single time. They maybe need more employees or better management. My recommendation is …
I’m a Professional Driver & Reserved a shower and toilette was dirty with number 2 gross, then wet towels inside the shower bad experience!

showerReviews.reviewText: This place is a rat hole !!!! It’s nasty staff very lazy took shower there I had to clean my self Indian guy said it was clean Iam like wow I will not stop here again bye bye it’s nasty
I never saw like this dirty shower before trucker.

… was stocked well with lots of souvenirs.  Small area with video casino games. Did not take a shower here but after seeing the restrooms I'm not sure I would want to. Restaurant wasn't all that great. Lady was nice and friendly but she was …

had to use the rr and signed said "closed , use shower 2 and 3" they argued with my wife saying rr are closed due to frozen pipes,but we where FOLLOWING THE SIGN THAT THEY PUT UP, they  kicked us out and locked doors
There was like 3 pube furballs in the shower...
